title: A Proposal for the Wrapped Transverse Five Brane in M(atrix) Theory
abstract: We propose a state in 5+1 super Yang-Mills theory which corresponds to the wrapped transverse five brane of M(atrix) theory on $T^5$. This state is a magnetic flux quantized in units of $1/g_6^2$ through a plane defined by one side of the box and a new direction which is not manifest.
